text:
Ban Mian so good i made a picture of it my phone wallpaper and telegram profile picture 😋❤️❤️😘 LOVE LOVE the texture of the noodles, its so springy and chewy and I just cant get enough of it. Must make sure to add the onsen egg to make the noodles creamy and extra yummy. I live on the other side of SG but i always come here just for the ban mian, even during my holidays.

The boss is also super nice! He became my wingman and helped get me my current girlfriend 😂😂 Sometimes i miss his ban mian more than my gf 🤣🤣 Gonna bring our kids here in the future😆😆
Really enjoyed the springy handmade ban mian with a generous amount of toppings. Must add chilli for that extra punch of flavour. Would prefer a thicker dark soy sauce tho.
Texture of noodles was amazing! Soup is slightly bland. I appreciate the money cai and minced meat. The blended chilli is spicer than usual, be warned. Love good noodles!
Freshly made noodles. Student friendly price. Tasty noodles. Yum yum.
noodles are freshly made and the dry banmian is super delicious and affordable. could eat this daily 😋
